H0.text: Which boxer broke Muhammed Ali's jaw. Joe Frazier

H1.text: Which boxer broke Muhammed Ali's jaw. George Foreman

H2.text: Which boxer broke Muhammed Ali's jaw. Floyd Patterson

H3.text: Which boxer broke Muhammed Ali's jaw. Ken Norton

A4.text: Ali was taken to a hospital immediately after the fight to check that his severely-swollen right-side jaw was not actually broken.
